content: {"name": "MY FATHER\u2019S HOUSE", "alternate_name": "", "description": "SHELTER/TRANSITIONAL HOUSING\n\nMAX. stay up to 60-90 days; families have access to: overnight accommodations (one family per room); showers; laundry; nursery; computers; kitchen facilities.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.cooperativeministry.com/programs/shelter-and-housing/my-fathers-house", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "769 Sunderland Road Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Concord", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28027", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.3896232, "longitude": -80.60272259999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 918-1269", "type": "voice"}]}
